[{"id":"dev-17368","entityId":"86-22812","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[Manual confirmation] Alter booking before accepting request not possible"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Walid Dechri"},{"name":"created","value":"1581416180350"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17368"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://www.regiondo-dev-de.de/resellers/account/bookings
Account emaildemoaccount@regiondo
Supplier ID9357
Order #1581410207073774400
EnvironmentWindows 10, Chrome Version 68.0.3440.106

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Place booking with manual confirmation Booking number 1581410207073774400
  2. Try to alter booking (E.g Propose new date from 21-03-2020 to 29-02-2020 )

Actual result:

Order Item can not be updated because it is not fully invoiced

Expected result:

Altering booking before being accepting should be possible in this case :
1- When date is changed
2- When qty is changed

PS : price should not be updated

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1581428160507,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"Star","cssClass":"c0"}]}, {"id":"dev-17227","entityId":"86-22737","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[gift voucher redemption] decline of booking request for invisible price lists not possible"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Stefan Seitz"},{"name":"created","value":"1580740777805"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17227"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://www.regiondo.com/resellers/account/bookingsview/key/
Product ID106594
Account emailiris.gligorea@regiondo.com
Supplier ID23776
Order #1980837026
Novomind Ticket ID79604



#### Steps to reproduce:
1. https://itsoftwaresibiu.regiondo.com/categories > Offer "Optional: Ticketshop title" > buy 1 ticket as gift for variation "2nd price list", option "asdadfafa" > complete purchase
2. Login > manage offers > my offers > product 106594 > Step 3 > set option "asdadfafa" to invisible > save and publish
3. https://itsoftwaresibiu.regiondo.com/voucher > redeem voucher for any date > request date
4. bookings > bookings > check booking for redeemed gift voucher


#### Actual result:

only "apply changes" button appears, clickng this button is followed by no action
no possibility to decline booking




#### Expected result:

Same as in https://track.regiondo.com/issue/dev-16595

When customer redeems gift certificate for an offer with invisible price list, supplier should have the same booking details template like offer with manual confirmation in order to let supplier decide if he accepts or declines the request.

When supplier declines the request, only value voucher should be proposed as refund method.

Refund should be done to the attendee not to the buyer

After refund system should send email template 58 to attendee

{"id":"dev-17192","entityId":"86-22660","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[POS][API] Social login with facebook and google"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Viktoriia Karenko"},{"name":"created","value":"1579785912463"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17192"},{"name":"description","value":"

Please add possibility to login with google and facebook with new oAuth2.0.
If reseller for current email doesn't exist please return an error "Unfortunately we cannot find a Regiondo account for this email address".

Input data:

access_token=facebook/google_access_token
scope=reseller-data,
grant_type=social_login,
client_id=POS,
client_secret=client_secret

Output data:

Same as we have for normal login
